meanings.sent1: The ghostly figure appeared even unearthlier in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: The haunted house had an unearthlier atmosphere than any other place in town.
meanings.sent3: The unearthlier shadows in the forest made the hikers feel like they were in a spooky movie.
meanings.sent4: The unearthlier sounds of the night made the campers shiver with fear.
meanings.sent5: The unearthlier presence of the alien spaceship left the town in awe and wonder.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is more unearthly
meanings.sent1: The eerie music played unearthlier as the night grew darker.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious mist swirled unearthlier around the old graveyard.
meanings.sent3: The magician waved his wand unearthlier than ever before, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled unearthlier in the clear night sky, like diamonds scattered above.
meanings.sent5: The strange lights flickered unearthlier in the abandoned house, giving it an otherworldly feel.
